content: I think I'll make a mug with a similar design to the one I made in the pottery class, maybe with a lighter blue glaze this time. I also like the idea of adding a small message on the mug, maybe something like "Sunday Morning" or "Love, [My Name]". What do you think about the pottery studio near my house that I've been taking classes at? Do you know if they have any upcoming classes or workshops that I might be interested in?
